name: SEPROM Loader
description: Binary View for loading 32 bits and 64 bits Apple SEPROM
longdescription:
# SEPROM loader

_Binary View for loading 32 bits and 64 bits Secure Enclave Processor ROM embedded in Apple's products_

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/matteyeux/seprom-loader/master/demo.PNG)

## Description 
Binary Ninja Binary View plugin for analyzing Apple's SEPROM. 
- Identifies SEPROM architecture    
- Performs rebase to the correct load address for accurate analysis    
- Restores some symbols for 64 bits SEPROMs

## Acknowledgments

- [Yui's](https://twitter.com/haiyuidesu) [sephelper](https://github.com/haiyuidesu/sephelper) for IDA PRO
- BlackwingHQ's [iBoot64Binja](https://github.com/BlackwingHQ/iBoot64Binja)
- [iBoot-Binja-Loader](https://github.com/EliseZeroTwo/iBoot-Binja-Loader)

installinstructions.Darwin: Copy to `~/Library/Application Support/Binary Ninja/plugins/` or use Plugin Manager
installinstructions.Windows: Copy to `%APPDATA%\Binary Ninja\plugins` or use Plugin Manager
installinstructions.Linux: Copy to `~/.binaryninja/plugins/` or use Plugin Manager
